mapper.insert: INSERT INTO film_scene ( film_id, cinema, date, begin_time, cinema_type ) VALUES ( #{filmScene.film_id}, #{filmScene.cinema}, #{filmScene.date}, #{filmScene.begin_time}, #{filmScene.cinema_type} )
INSERT INTO `order` ( user_id, film_scene_id, amount, orderdate, order_number ) VALUES ( #{order.user_id}, #{order.film_scene_id}, #{order.amount}, #{order.orderdate}, #{order.order_number} )
mapper.select: SELECT c.* ,b.film_name,b.image_src,b.type,b.time,b.price, (SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(seat.`row`,'/',seat.`column`) from seat where seat.film_s_id = film_scene_id) as seat FROM `film_scene` c left JOIN film1 b on b.id=c.film_id WHERE c.film_scene_id=#{filmSceneId}

SELECT c.order_id, a.film_name, a.time, a.image_src, b.cinema, b.cinema_type, b.begin_time, d.seatinfo, c.amount, c.orderdate, c.order_number, d.ordseatnum FROM `order` c LEFT JOIN film_scene b ON b.film_scene_id = c.film_scene_id LEFT JOIN film1 a ON a.id = b.film_id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT GROUP_CONCAT( seat.`row`+1, '/', seat.`column`+1 ) AS seatinfo, ord_id, COUNT(*) AS ordseatnum FROM seat GROUP BY ord_id ) d ON d.ord_id = c.order_id WHERE c.user_id =#{userid}
AND a.film_name like concat('%','${search}','%')
